CustomField.description: calculated based on user input for “Has Ownership Over the Freight?” and “Has Control Over Lodgement Facility?”. Last modified Opp will update the field on the Account record.
CustomField.formula: IF(AND(NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(FreightOwnership__c))),NOT(ISBLANK( TEXT(ControlsLodgement__c))), ISPICKVAL(FreightOwnership__c, 'Yes'),ISPICKVAL(ControlsLodgement__c, 'Yes')) , 'No', IF(AND(NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(FreightOwnership__c))),NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(ControlsLodgement__c))),OR(ISPICKVAL(FreightOwnership__c, 'No (unknown) - (then a DSR must be lodged for Pricing)'),ISPICKVAL(ControlsLodgement__c, 'No (unknown) - (then a DSR must be lodged for Pricing)'))) , 'Yes', ''))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is set to ‘No’ by system if customer has ownership over the freight and control over lodgement facility. Otherwise it is set to ‘Yes’.
CustomField.label: Indirect Customer?
